description: Almost three years ago a very young, naive Faith came to Hogtied and did her first Bondage shoot. Now one of Adult's premiere models, Faith Leon has risen to stardom. The circle is now complete; our little bondage model went out and grew up famous and even became more beautiful than before. Ok, so now that you're famous doesn't mean we let up any. Faith takes some hard ties, hardcore tickling, and some very powerful wracking orgasms. Unlike most models, fame did not make Faith Leon soft. Thanks for coming back Faith.
title: Hogtied welcomes back the beautiful Faith Leon. Now an adult "A" lister, Faith returns to her roots
